column4: Maybe I need to try something other then Gnome.  It seems to be bogging up everything

Don't wanna go back to ms though
are there any cdrom related lines in /etc/fstab?

Feel like walking me through the commands?
ok, close totem if it's still open, start it again and try the DVD again
same error as last time? about the mountpoint?
damn. sorry, I'm stumped without a machine to compare on and it's time for me to go home anyway. sorry and good luck!
